This is a testharness.js-based test.

PASS "f\0oo" becomes "fï¿½oo"
PASS "\0foo" becomes "ï¿½foo"
PASS "\0" becomes "ï¿½"
PASS "\0\0\0" becomes "ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½"

FAIL "fí €oo" becomes "fï¿½oo" assert_equals: expected "f\ufffdoo" but got "fí €oo"
